message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $14,000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to consider my own needs. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. It's a fair price that I think you'll find reasonable.
